name: Break It! (itch) (andgeno, JeremyRemy, jm_yikes, Akura361)
description:
A game made during the Mix and Game Jam 2019.

The topic of this game jam was "Dimension Change".

Break It! is a game where you are in control of a cannon so you can shoot the bricks above you. The original game (Breakout / Arkanoid) was played in 2D back in the days. We wanted to give this old classic game a new spin in 3D.
